basics.label: Art Director, Key Holder, Sales Planner
basics.summary: Art Director with strong background in production management. Specializes in sales, fashion marketing and editorial film making. Well versed in team building and creative planning. Extensive high-profile brand knowledge.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Controlled the release of proprietary and confidential information for general client lists. Created strategies to develop and expand existing customer sales. Maintained productive relationships with existing clients through exceptional personal follow-up after sales.
highlights: Resulted in a 6% increase in monthly sales.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked in direct relation with designer during editorial production to create the look and feel of the brand. Collaborated with modeling agencies, stylists, editors and designers.
highlights: Shot and produced look books for Fall2015/Spring 2016
Directed all styling and outfitting for a production cast.
